flawed_nl_solution:
Shelby and her mom made 12 bags of buttered popcorn + 10 bags of caramel popcorn = <<12+10=22>>22 bags.
Of those 22 bags, her brother took 3 bags of buttered popcorn + 1 bag of caramel popcorn = <<3+1=4>>4 bags.
So now Shelby has 22 bags - 4 bags = <<22-4=13>>13 bags of popcorn left.
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
